abstract: Peter Wayner, a technology writer, struggles with how to respond to the widespread piracy of his books online.
snippet: Peter Wayner, a technology writer, struggles with how to respond to the widespread piracy of his books online.
lead_paragraph: The specter of piracy of my books materialized for me several weeks ago when I typed the four words “wayner data compression textbook” into Google. Five of the top 10 links pointed to sites distributing pirated copies. (And now, it’s six.)

headline.main: A Book Author Wonders How to Fight Piracy

abstract: Google confirms that users were having problems accessing services but doesn’t reveal the scope of the problems.
snippet: Google confirms that users were having problems accessing services but doesn’t reveal the scope of the problems.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:25 p.m.: Google says the problems have been resolved.

headline.main: Google Confirms Problems With Reaching Its Services
